lines: Used to be I couldn't imagine it being any better, but now I can see it. One day someone will ask me who I am, and I will tell them I am Isse of Doma, not with shame...but with pride.
But I know we can't do it alone, so I hope...I hope you'll continue to help us. Please.
What the─ We heard you and the others left for Kugane! We wanted to thank you, of course, but we never had the chance...
I, uh, I suppose I could... Ahem. Thank you. For everything, that is... Anyway! I won't keep you. I know you have another war to fight.
Of all the people! I knew Lord Hien and the others went west to join in your fight, but I didn't think you would be coming back with him!
Still, it's a relief to see you alive and well. If you've got time, you should stay a while. I'm sure the others would be glad to see you.
Thank you again for saving me and Azami from the Kojin.
Though to be honest, I was terrified when that imperial first arrived. I thought he'd come to finish what the Kojin had started.
I'll never forget what that woman did to us. But as long as Azami is happy, that's all that matters.
